predicate.note: Frames file for 'toil' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: usually intransitive
example.text: ``Other people are making it overnight, and the rest who [*T*-1] toil daily don't want to miss that opportunity when it seems to come along.''

example.name: job as purpose
example.text: Some activists are toiling [*-1] to raise the profile of the two causes.
